text: This transmits revised IRM 2.13.13, Enterprise Networks, Enterprise Electronic Facsimile

This IRM has been prepared in accordance with requirements resulting from the IRM restructuring and IRS modernization efforts. It provides guidance and directions for telecommunications services and knowledge of the processes and standards that are in place. IRM 2.13.13, Enterprise Networks, Enterprise Electronic Facsimile (EEFax) is no longer needed. As of June 30, 2016 Information in 2.13.13 is obsoleted and will go into the Service Catalog as catalog items, and the other content will be divided into User Guides, Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs), Knowledge Articles, and posted as information on SharePoint sites.

The Information Technology (IT) organizations and other divisions and functions needing telecommunications will use this IRM. IRM 2.13.13, Enterprise Networks, Enterprise Electronic Facsimile (EEFax) is no longer needed. As of June 30, 2016 Information in IRM 2.13.13 is obsoleted and will go into the Service Catalog as catalog items, and the other content will be divided into User Guides, Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs), Knowledge Articles, and posted as information on SharePoint sites.
This standard is to be used by the Information Technology (IT) organizations and other divisions and functions needing telecommunications services.
